name: Create Google Sheets spreadsheet rows from new proposals accepted in Fresh Proposals
description: Every time a new proposal is accepted in Fresh Proposals, Make will automatically add that proposal to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ctAz8FWFv7HyZUa4aHrgGAQ3O2y7vZEl3sqv_vXIZHc/edit?usp=sharing).
